title: Echoes of the Ancients
description: Ancient ruins hold the secrets to a long-forgotten civilization. The player must decipher inscriptions, restore artifacts, and unveil the history of the lost society.
subquest: Explore the ruins and decipher the ancient inscriptions.
Gather scattered artifacts to reconstruct the forgotten history.
Solve intricate puzzles to unlock hidden chambers within the ruins.
Unveil the truth behind the downfall of the ancient civilization.
Face the guardian spirit protecting the final chamber of secrets.
Preserve the knowledge of the lost society for future generations.
